an7.60:1.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu nacirasseva asavanam khaya …pe… sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyya.
an7.60:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, silava hoti, bahussuto hoti, patisallino hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, satima hoti, pannava hoti.
an7.60:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu nacirasseva asavanam khaya …pe… sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyya”ti.
